trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet
Debug-Process
Debug-Process
简述

trans-unit.source: Debugs one or more processes running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 调试在本地计算机上运行的一个或多个进程。
语法
名称 （默认值）
ID
InputObject
说明

trans-unit.source: The Debug-Process cmdlet attaches a debugger to one or more running processes on a local computer.
trans-unit.target: Debug-Process cmdlet 将调试程序附加到在本地计算机上运行的一个或多个进程。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the processes by their process name or process ID (PID), or you can pipe process objects to Debug-Process.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过进程名称或进程 ID (PID) 来指定进程，也可以将进程对象通过管道传送给 Debug-Process。

trans-unit.source: Debug-Process attaches the debugger that is currently registered for the process.
trans-unit.target: Debug-Process 将附加当前为该进程注册的调试程序。

trans-unit.source: Before using this cmdlet, verify that a debugger is downloaded and correctly configured.
trans-unit.target: 使用此 cmdlet 之前，请先验证调试程序是否已下载并正确配置。
示例

trans-unit.source: This command attaches a debugger to the PowerShell process on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将调试程序附加到计算机上的 PowerShell 进程。

trans-unit.source: This command attaches a debugger to all processes that have names that begin with "sql".
trans-unit.target: 此命令将调试程序附加到名称以“sql”开头的所有进程。

trans-unit.source: This command attaches a debugger to the Winlogon, Explorer, and Outlook processes.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将调试程序附加到 Winlogon、Explorer 和 Outlook 进程。

trans-unit.source: This command attaches a debugger to the processes that have process IDs 1132 and 2028.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将调试程序附加到进程 ID 为 1132 和 2028 的进程。

trans-unit.source: This command attaches a debugger to the PowerShell processes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将调试程序附加到计算机上的 PowerShell 进程。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Get-Process cmdlet to get the PowerShell processes on the computer, and it uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the processes to the Debug-Process cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 Get-Process cmdlet 来获取计算机上的 PowerShell 进程，然后使用管道运算符 (|) 将进程发送给 Debug-Process cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To specify a particular PowerShell process, use the ID parameter of Get-Process.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定特定的 PowerShell 进程，请使用 Get-Process 的 ID 参数。

trans-unit.source: This command attaches a debugger to the current PowerShell processes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将调试程序附加到计算机上的当前 PowerShell 进程。

trans-unit.source: It uses the $pid automatic variable, which contains the process ID of the current PowerShell process.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 $pid 自动变量，其中包含当前 PowerShell 进程的进程 ID。

trans-unit.source: Then, it uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the process ID to the Debug-Process cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用管道运算符 (|) 将进程 ID 发送给 Debug-Process cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the $pid automatic variable, see about_Automatic_Variables.
trans-unit.target: 有关 $pid 自动变量的详细信息，请参阅 about_Automatic_Variables。

trans-unit.source: This command attaches a debugger to the MyApp processes on the Server01 and Server02 computers.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将调试程序附加到 Server01 和 Server02 计算机上的 MyApp 进程。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Get-Process cmdlet to get the MyApp processes on the Server01 and Server02 computers.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 Get-Process cmdlet 来获取 Server01 和 Server02 计算机上的 MyApp 进程。

trans-unit.source: It uses a pipeline operator to send the processes to the Debug-Process cmdlet, which attaches the debuggers.
trans-unit.target: 它使用管道运算符将进程发送给附加调试程序的 Debug-Process cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This command attaches a debugger to the PowerShell processes on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将调试程序附加到本地计算机上的 PowerShell 进程。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the Get-Process cmdlet to get the PowerShell processes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用 Get-Process cmdlet 来获取计算机上的 PowerShell 进程。

trans-unit.source: It saves the resulting process object in the $p variable.
trans-unit.target: 它将生成的进程对象保存在 $p 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the InputObject parameter of Debug-Process to submit the process object in the $p variable to Debug-Process.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 Debug-Process 的 InputObject 参数将 $p 变量中的进程对象提交给 Debug-Process。
参数
-Id

trans-unit.source: Specifies the process IDs of the processes to be debugged.
trans-unit.target: 指定要调试的进程的进程 ID。
参数名（“-Id”）为可选项。

trans-unit.source: To find the process ID of a process, type "get-process".
trans-unit.target: 要查找进程的进程 ID，请键入“get-process”。
-InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the process objects that represent processes to be debugged.
trans-unit.target: 指定表示要调试的进程的进程对象。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the process objects or a command that gets the process objects, such as a Get-Process command.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个包含进程对象的变量，或输入一个获取进程对象的命令（如 Get-Process 命令）。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe process objects to Debug-Process.
trans-unit.target: 还可以将进程对象通过管道传送给 Debug-Process。
-Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the names of the processes to be debugged.
trans-unit.target: 指定要调试的进程的名称。

trans-unit.source: If there is more than one process with the same name, Debug-Process attaches a debugger to all processes with that name.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在多个同名进程，则 Debug-Process 会将调试程序附加到所有该名称的进程。
参数名（“Name”）为可选项。
-Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。
-WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。
cmdlet 未运行。
CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。
有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。
输入
System.Int32，System.Diagnostics.Process，System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a process ID (Int32), a process object (System.Diagnostics.Process), or a process name (String) to Debug-Process.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过管道将进程 ID (Int32)、进程对象 (System.Diagnostics.Process) 或进程名称 (String) 传递给 Debug-Process。
输出
无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。
说明

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet uses the AttachDebugger method of the Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) Win32_Process class.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 使用 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) Win32_Process 类的 AttachDebugger 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this method, see "AttachDebugger Method" in the MSDN (Microsoft Developer Network) library at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143640.
trans-unit.target: 有关此方法的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN (Microsoft Developer Network) 库中的“AttachDebugger 方法”，网址是 http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143640。
相关的链接
Debug-Process
Get-Process
Start-Process
停止进程
Wait-Process
